event.description: Ian Kinsler pops out to third baseman Adrian Beltre.
Elvis Andrus singles on a ground ball to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Michael Young grounds out, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan. Elvis Andrus to 2nd.
Hank Blalock flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Marlon Byrd lines out to third baseman Adrian Beltre.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
David Murphy singles on a line drive to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Ian Kinsler flies out to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Elvis Andrus bunt pops out to pitcher Felix Hernandez.
Michael Young singles on a ground ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez, deflected by second baseman Jose Lopez.
Hank Blalock doubles (5) on a line drive to left fielder Endy Chavez. Michael Young scores.
Marlon Byrd singles on a ground ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Hank Blalock scores.
Nelson Cruz singles on a line drive to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Marlon Byrd to 2nd.

Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Ian Kinsler strikes out swinging.
Elvis Andrus singles on a line drive to left fielder Endy Chavez.
Michael Young homers (7) on a fly ball to right field. Elvis Andrus scores.
Hank Blalock strikes out swinging.
Marlon Byrd strikes out swinging.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan.
David Murphy singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.

Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Ian Kinsler flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Pitching Change: Sean White replaces Felix Hernandez.

Hank Blalock walks.

David Murphy walks.
With Chris Davis batting, David Murphy caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Kenji Johjima to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt.
Chris Davis grounds out, pitcher Sean White to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Pitching Change: Denny Stark replaces Sean White.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia flies out to left fielder Endy Chavez.

Endy Chavez grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
